label: 徳政免除権
対訳語: privilege of exemption from debt cancellation decrees
本: Cities in Medieval Japan. ACTA ASIATICA, 44 . The Tōhō Gakkai . 1983
見出し読み: とくせいめんじょけん
見出し読み_mod: とくせいめんじょけん
説明文: In opposition to the claims of village peasants and the urban poor for the right to earn a living through promulgation of benevolent administration and the cancellation of debts (tokusei 徳政), the city federations fought for and won the privilege of exemption from such debt cancellation decrees (tokusei 徳政免除権), thus both establishing their rights to carry on private monetary transactions, as well as to administrater a legal system concerned with the affairs of individuals. [SS]
